code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{createRule}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RuleCreator=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[ruleString,setRuleString]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await createRule({name,description,rule_string:ruleString});setName('');setDescription('');setRuleString('');alert('Rule created successfully!');}catch(error){alert('Error creating rule: '+error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Rule Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),placeholder:"Rule Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:ruleString,onChange:e=>setRuleString(e.target.value),placeholder:"Rule String",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Create Rule"})]});};export default RuleCreator;
